page.title: 07TRADE LANCING MARKET
page.content: We did a survey on the market,it's held next to the Lancing railway station.It opens at 9.00am till 3pm on Wednesday.There are 36 stalls.They are the following:11 clothes,8 food 3 sweets,1 stationary,2 selling shoes,2 selling bedroom,bathroom,kitchen accessories,1 knitting stall,1toy stall,1 selling bags,1 pet stall and 1 crockery stall.We interviewed a man who sold frozen food we found out that he gets up at 3.00am to get ready and arrives between 6 & 8am.He travels 100 miles round trip.He's been working here for 3 years and has been in the market trade since school.He buys his goods from a supermarket.People buy a lot from his stall.He's only had one person complain about his goods.He gets alot of costomers each week.He enjoys his job.SARAH,ANNA,LISA & ELIZABETH.IRENE AVENUE MIDDLE SCHOOL.
